synopsis.text:
What awaits a young bear named Yamatarou is a heartwarming tale of friendship and resilience. After the tragic loss of his parents, Yamatarou finds himself under the care of humans. In this unfamiliar world, he becomes an object of exploitation for a cruel merchant, leaving him yearning for the comfort of his forest home.

Amidst his struggles, Yamatarou discovers solace in an unlikely friendship with Shi-roku, a steam locomotive who frequently visits the town. Shi-roku's encouraging presence and wise counsel provide the bear cub with much-needed comfort and guidance. Yamatarou, in admiration, learns to mimic the locomotive's whistle, a testament to their unique bond.

As the fourth installment of the Lion Books Series, this story beautifully captures the essence of friendship and determination through vivid illustrations that exude warmth. Join Yamatarou and Shi-roku on their journey, as they navigate through challenges and cherish their unbreakable bond. Will Yamatarou find his way back home, or will his future hold a different path? Only time will tell.
